response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $995,000. This represents a significant savings of $205,000 compared to its full value. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear from you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 995000}
